title: Is 2022 a Make-or-Break Year for Some Brands? - The After Show
itunes:title: Is 2022 a Make-or-Break Year for Some Brands? - The After Show
description:
Today we are talking about which brands need to break through in 2022. It’s now or never for some brands and we talk about which ones they are.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
